author: Portia Arthur
title: Ghanaian Doctor With Flawless Dark Skin Rocks Gold Glittering Corseted Kente Gown For Her Wedding - YEN.COM.GH
text: Ghanaian Doctor With Flawless Dark Skin Rocks Gold Glittering Corseted Kente Gown For Her Wedding - Ghanaian doctor has gone viral with her beautiful outfits for her viral wedding photos and videos - The melanin bride looked ravishing in four different hairstyles and makeup to match her looks - Some social media users have commented on Dr Afia Agyinsam's flawless skin and beautiful smile Ghanaian medical doctor and published author Afia Agyinsam walked down the aisle in a lovely ceremony over the weekend with some top politicians in attendance. At the lavish wedding ceremony, her Excellency the Second Lady of Ghana, [Samira Bawumia](https://yen.com.gh/tags/samira-bawumia/), looked exquisite in a blue lace gown and matching turban. Watch the [video](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1Y885vibRD/) below; PAY ATTENTION: Сheck out news that is picked exactly for YOU ➡️ click on [“Recommended for you” ](https://yen.com.gh/recommended/)and enjoy! Ghanaian bride Afia Agyinsam dazzled in a gold-beaded kente gown and an elegant hairstyle for her traditional wedding. Watch the [video](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1Jf6tliKJy/) below; Ghanaian bride Afia looks stunning in a kente fringe dress for her wedding reception The gorgeous melanin bride looked effortlessly chic in a sleeveless kente dress paired with designer shoes for her traditional wedding reception. The handsome groom and medical doctor wore a three-piece agbada while showing off his dance moves. Watch the [video](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1Ly6xLiGBv/) below; Some social media users have commented on Ghanaian bride Dr Afia Sam's wedding photos YEN.com.gh has compiled some reactions below; Adademartha stated: Black is gold aphiya_konadu stated: Black beauty....wow __ann__macs stated: Dark Chocolate ❤️❤️ glam_by_veth stated: Always maintaining ski yvnn_parry stated: As always!! Yomiflawless stated: Holy grail bling_outlet stated: Skin is skinning! Well done @reggies_makeovers Takyiwaaaa stated: Beautiful kinesh_creationz stated: She is a beauty….. Black is bae barb_rita_ stated: Congratulations Dr.Afia Leezy. heezy stated: Black beauty makeup_by_plange stated: Tuntum broni ampa afiaboatemaa360 stated: Black Magic❤️ Ackahphyllis stated: Congrats Afia. We are still chillaxing here Ghanaian Bride With Curves Looks Stunning In One-Of-A-Kind Kente Gown Adorned With Intricate Fringes Earlier, YEN.com.gh wrote about a [Ghanaian bride](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/style/248387-ghanaian-bride-curves-stunning-a-kind-kente-gown-adorned-intricate-fringes/), Vanessa, who married wearing an exquisite kente gown. A well-known Ghanaian wedding fashion designer created the stunning bride with the most attention. Several social media users have complimented the bride while praising the designer for her outstanding work.
